snippet: A Mexican professional wrestler died from a blow sustained in the ring, the Baja California state prosecutor’s office said.
abstract: Autopsy reveals that Mexican professional wrestler Pedro Aguayo Ramirez died from trauma to neck and cervical fracture, injuries he sustained in the ring.
lead_paragraph: A Mexican professional wrestler died from a blow sustained in the ring, the Baja California state prosecutor’s office said.

headline.main: Fatal Injury Sustained in Wrestling Ring
